org.epochx.core
Class MutationManager

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.core.MutationManager

public class MutationManager
extends java.lang.Object

This component is responsible for handling the mutation operation and for firing mutation events.

Use of the mutation operation will generate the following events:

Event Revert Modify Raised when?
onMutationStart no no Before the mutation operation is carried out.
onMutation yes yes Immediately after mutation is carried out, giving the listener the opportunity to request a revert which will cause a re-selection of a program and mutation of that program which will result in this event being raised again.
onMutationEnd no no After the mutation operation has been completed.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs an instance of MutationManager which will setup the mutation operation.

Constructor Detail

MutationManager

public MutationManager(Model model)
Constructs an instance of MutationManager which will setup the mutation operation. Note that the actual mutation operation will be performed by the subclass of Mutation returned by the model's getMutation() method.

Parameters:
model - the Model which defines the Mutation operator and ProgramSelector to use to perform one act of mutation on an individual in the population.
See Also:
Mutation
Method Detail

mutate

public CandidateProgram mutate()
Selects a CandidateProgram from the population using the ProgramSelector returned by a call to getProgramSelector() on the model given at construction and submits it to the Mutation operator which is obtained by calling getMutation() on the model.

After a mutation is made, the child program is checked for validity by calling its isValid() method. If the program is found to be invalid then the program is discarded, a new program is and the mutation operation is attempted again. If the child program is valid then the mutation event is fired which gives any listeners the opportunity to revert the operation by returning null, or modify the child that is returned. If null is returned to revert then the reversion count is incremented by 1 and a new program is selected mutation operation is repeated.

Returns:
a CandidateProgram generated through mutation by the Mutation operator in use.
